Introduction

Kim Ji Won, popularly known as Bobby. He is the main rapper and producer of the boy group iKON. Bobby was born in Seoul, South Korea but later moved to Fairfax, Virginia, United States with his parents until he was in high school.

Bobby first appeared in the 2013 survival program "W.I.N Who is Next" as a member of the boy group Team B. He also competed in the third season "Show Me the Money" where he finished as the champion. He eventually made his official debut in October 2015 as the main rapper of iKON (formerly called Team B).

On August 20, 2021, Bobby suprised everyone when he announced that he would get married later in the year and that he will become a father by September of the same year. In 2023 he announced his official club in Japan and also the name of his solo fanbase "S.I.R".
